column.name: QZBJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

column.name: BMZKZY
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select userid from lbmember t where t.ROLEID=7 and t.ORGID=?",[SSBM])

column.name: ECZKBSHRYZS
column.describe: 二次质控部审核人员(主审)

column.name: ECZKBSHSRFS
column.describe: 二次质控部审核人员(副审)

column.name: ZKBSHRYZS_FD
column.describe: 质控部审核人员(主审)_辅导

column.name: ZKBSHSRFS_FD
column.describe: 质控部审核人员(副审)_辅导

column.name: ECNHZKSHY_ZS
column.describe: 二次内核质控审核员(主审)

column.name: ECNHZKSHY_FS
column.describe: 二次内核质控审核员(副审)

column.name: CXDDNBRQ
column.describe: 持续督导年度工作报告披露日期

column.name: ZXCXDDRQ
column.describe: 最新持续督导报告披露日期
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if (1==1){
O_THIS.getColumn("ZXCXDDRQ").setLabel("持续督导年度工作报告披露日期");
}
1==0

constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMJD.ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TIB_XMJD WHERE ID != 100000 AND ZT = 1 START WITH ID = 100000 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[]]

column.name: BQ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color = red>请确认持续督导开始日期与项目完成日期是否存在差异!</font>'
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT CASE to_char(?,'yyyymmdd')- to_char(?) when 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM dual ",[XMWCRQ,JRCXDDRQ]);
i==1

column.name: JRCXDDRQ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if (1==1){
O_THIS.getColumn("JRCXDDRQ").setLabel("持续督导开始日期");
}
1==0

column.name: ZXCXDDRQ2
column.describe: 最新持续督导报告披露日期
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
if (1==1){
O_THIS.getColumn("ZXCXDDRQ").setLabel("持续督导年度工作报告披露日期");
}
1==0

column.name: CXDDNBRQ
column.describe: 持续督导年度工作报告披露日期

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
以下信息拟报送监管系统，请谨慎填写'

column.name: XMMC
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE ? IN (2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,11,12,13)',[XMLX]) ==1 && SFCDMKZXQ == 1

column.name: XMLX
column.comment:
注释：重大资产重组项目类型
包括：交易所审批类型、证监会审批类型
上市公司收购财务顾问项目类型
包括：简式权益变动类型、详式权益变动类型及要约收购

column.name: KXDM
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE ? IN (2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,11,12,13)',[XMLX]) !=1 || SFCDMKZXQ != 1

column.name: SFCDMKZXQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE ? IN (2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,11,12,13)',[XMLX]) !=1

constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMJD.ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TIB_XMJD WHERE ID != 100000 AND ZT = 1 START WITH ID = 100000 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[]]

column.name: LSDM2
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE(" SELECT LSDM FROM ECIF.TIB_WDJBXXCJ WHERE KHMC = ?",[SSKH2])

column.name: GPDM2
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE(" SELECT GPDM FROM ECIF.TIB_WDJBXXCJ WHERE KHMC = ?",[SSKH2])

column.name: QZBJDBR2
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

validator.name: expression
validator.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT LENGTH(?)-LENGTH(replace(?, ';', '')) FROM dual",[QZBJDBR2,QZBJDBR2])<2
validator.message: "签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)不得超过2个人"

validator.name: expression
validator.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT LENGTH(?)-LENGTH(replace(?, ';', '')) FROM dual",[QTCY2,QTCY2])<30

column.name: BMZKZY2
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select userid from lbmember t where t.ROLEID=7 and t.ORGID=?",[SSBM2])

column.name: XMWCRQ
column.comment: <font color=red>适用上市/挂牌时间的，填写 "上市/挂牌时间"；不适用上市/挂牌时间的，填写"缴款截止日"。</font></br> <font color=red>针对重大资产重组和收购等项目，不涉及股份上市及挂牌时间的，填写"实施完毕日/收购完成日"<font>

column.name: ZQDM2
column.comment: <font color=red>填写完成日期后证券代码必填<font>

column.name: ZQJC2
column.comment: <font color=red>填写完成日期后证券简称必填<font>

column.name: BZSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '<font color=red>以下信息拟报送监管系统，请谨慎填写<font>'

column.name: XMLX
column.comment:
注释：重大资产重组项目类型
包括：交易所审批类型、证监会审批类型
上市公司收购财务顾问项目类型
包括：简式权益变动类型、详式权益变动类型及要约收购

constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMLX.ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TIB_XMLX WHERE ID != 100000 AND ZT = 1 START WITH ID = 100000 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[]]

column.name: QZBJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)

validator.name: expression
validator.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT LENGTH(?)-LENGTH(replace(?, ';', '')) FROM dual",[QZBJDBR,QZBJDBR])<2
validator.message: "签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)不得超过2个人"

validator.name: expression
validator.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT LENGTH(?)-LENGTH(replace(?, ';', '')) FROM dual",[QTCY,QTCY])<30

constraint.SQL: ["tIB_XMJD.ID IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TIB_XMJD WHERE ID != 100000 AND ZT = 1 START WITH ID = 100000 CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[]]
